description:
Big Mom has Caesar Clown at her whims - and despite his bilking her out of countless amounts of money - she is ready to continue her pursuit of maniacal world control! Meanwhile, Big Mom`s forces are on to the Straw Hats, and Pekoms faces a dire situation!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Giant Ambition! Big Mom and Caesar!
Ein gigantisches Vorhaben! – Big Mom und Caesar!
Kyoudai na Yabou: Big Mom to Caesar
Une ambition gigantesque. Big Mom et Caesar
Гигантские амбиции! Большая Мамочка и Цезарь!
巨大な野望 ビッグ・マムとシーザー
